name: Middle Man
description:
A game where you are the middle man between 2 scientists that are required to work together to save the world. The problem is neither of them will leave their houses, so you are tasked with running between them in an ever-expanding void to fuel innovation to end the catastrophe.

Controls
  • Move: W A S D
  • Use/Interact/Grapple: E
  • Jump: Space
  • Toggle Crouch: C
  • Run: Left Shift
  • Pause/Open Menu: Escape
Credits
  • Project Lead & Director: Chaz Wilson
  • Head System's Engineer & Developer: Daniel Mott
  • Writer & Narrative Design: William Cooley
  • Background Music: Escalier, by Anemoia
  • Interaction Sound Effect: Computer Processing Sound-Effects - short click select 01, by Samuel F. Johnson
  • Grapple Sound Effect: Zipper Unzip 4, by Rutger Muller
  • Bauble Icons: GameDev Market RPG Humble Bundle
